snippet: ROTHENBERG--Janet, 68, of New York. Passed away on April 19 in her beloved Manhattan apartment. She is survived by her husband, Andrew and her son, Jordan. A caring and loving friend, sister, wife and mother, she will be greatly missed by those lucky enough to have had her in their lives. Janet lived a great and exciting life, cared for by many and giving back just as much. She has gone now, but the memories we have of her have left a mark on all of our hearts. Funeral services will be held at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave., New York, on Sunday, April 24 at 11:30am. 1/3
